pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Colour Picker Tool for Shiny and for Selecting Colours in Plots // A colour picker that can be used as an input in Shiny apps or Rmarkdown documents. The colour picker supports alpha opacity, custom colour palettes, and many more options. A Plot Colour Helper tool is available as an RStudio Addin, which helps you pick colours to use in your plots. A more generic Colour Picker RStudio Addin is also provided to let you select colours to use in your R code.
